info.title: OWJ CRS Flight API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the OWJ CRS Flight Service.

post.description:
This Method is for flight search.
It provides search id for the search request which can be used to get the results.
It also provides any flights that are available at the time of the request

400.description: An error occurred. Check the error code and message.

422.description: Validation error. The input doesn't match the schema. Check the error code and message.

get.description:
This Method is for getting the results of a search.
It provides the results of the search with the given search id.

post.description:
This Method is for grid search.
It provides the cheapest price for each day between the given dates.

currency.description: Currency to be used for pricing
Currency to be used for pricing

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Time in seconds after which search you can get results

fare.description: Single fare, this is the fare that will be used for booking

key.title: Key
key.description: Segment key. Segment key is a combination of departure code, arrival code, airline and flight number.

code.title: Code
code.description: Segment code. Segment code is a combination of departure code, arrival code and stops.

flight_number.title: Flight Number
flight_number.description: Flight number, first two characters are airline code and the rest is flight number

operating_flight_number.title: Operating Flight Number
operating_flight_number.description: Operating flight number, first two characters are airline code and the rest is flight number
